name: Frost-Star XL
description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: J-Span 
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Civilian
As your ship flies, components generate heat that can be damaging and even lead to system failures unless properly dealt with by a dependable and properly designed cooler like the Frost-Star XL from J-Span.
description_cn:
物品类型：冷却器
制造商：J-Span 
尺寸：3
等级：C
类别：民用
当您驾驶着您的飞船在空间中驰骋时，飞船的部件仍会不断地产生热量并有可能在没有被妥善处理的情况下造成损坏甚至导致系统出错的发生。为此，像是这款由J-Span制造的冰霜之星 XL的冷却器会是您合理且可靠的选择。

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-微科星(microTech)-特雷斯勒太空站-PlatinumBay
